title: Aram stupid roll needs to be fixed
body:
I god udyr, I rolled for a new champion and got vladimir.. Not a good roll. So, i rolled again and got udyr AGAIN,,

It needs to be changed, you shouldn't be able to get person you already rolled..

replies.body: That's not a bug, that's a gameplay suggestion...
It's not a bug, it's stupid.. you play a lot to get those rolls, then it fails you by giving you the same champion twice..
